meanings.definition: A person or animal with only one testicle.
meanings.sent1: The vet explained that some animals, like monorchids, can live perfectly healthy lives with only one testicle.
meanings.sent2: The zookeeper was surprised to learn that one of the lions was a monorchid.
meanings.sent3: At the pet show, the monorchid cat won the 'Best Personality' award.
meanings.sent4: In a world of pairs, the monorchids stand out as unique individuals.
meanings.sent5: The children at the farm were fascinated by the monorchids among the goats.

meanings.definition: The condition of having only one testicle.
meanings.sent1: The doctor explained the implications of being a monorchid to the patient.
meanings.sent2: Monorchids may face certain challenges due to their condition.
meanings.sent3: The monorchid's missing testicle was the talk of the town.
meanings.sent4: In a sea of pairs, the monorchids proudly stood alone.
meanings.sent5: The monorchids in the wild have adapted to their unique situation.
